title: Cannot locate core MKL libraries
body:
I'm trying to build something with an external `intel-parallel-studio` installation, but it fails to find the right MKL libraries.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ module show intel
-------------------------------------------------------------------
/usr/local/modulefiles/intel/18.0:

module-whatis	 Name:        ICC 
module-whatis	 Long Name:   Parallel Studio XE 2018 Cluster Edition update 1 
module-whatis	 Version:     2018, update 1 
module-whatis	 Category:    compiler 
module-whatis	 Description: The GNU compiler 
setenv		 VT_MPI impi4 
setenv		 INTEL_PYTHONHOME /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/python/intel64/ 
setenv		 DAALROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/daal 
prepend-path	 CPLUS_INCLUDE_PATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/clck/2018.1/include 
prepend-path	 PATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/advisor_2018.1.1.535164/bin64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/vtune_amplifier_2018.1.0.535340/bin64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/inspector_2018.1.1.535159/bin64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/intel64/bin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/intel64/bin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/clck/2018.1/bin/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/bin/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/intel64/bin 
append-path	 PATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/parallel_studio_xe_2018.1.038/bin 
setenv		 CLCK_ROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/clck/2018.1 
prepend-path	 MANPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/man:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/man/common:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/man:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/documentation_2018/en/debugger/gdb-ia/man:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/documentation_2018/en/debugger/gdb-igfx/man 
setenv		 MPM_LAUNCHER /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/mpm/mic/bin/start_mpm.sh 
prepend-path	 LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/clck/2018.1/lib/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/ipp/lib/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl/lib/intel64_lin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb/lib/intel64/gcc4.4:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb/lib/intel64/gcc4.4:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/daal/lib/intel64_lin 
setenv		 ADVISOR_2018_DIR /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/advisor_2018.1.1.535164 
setenv		 VT_ROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017 
prepend-path	 CLASSPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/mpi.jar:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/daal/lib/daal.jar 
setenv		 PSTLROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/pstl 
setenv		 I_MPI_ROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi 
setenv		 GDB_CROSS /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/gdb/intel64/bin/gdb-ia 
setenv		 IPPROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/ipp 
setenv		 INSPECTOR_2018_DIR /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/inspector_2018.1.1.535159 
setenv		 VT_ARCH intel64 
prepend-path	 INTEL_LICENSE_FILE 1700@cc-lic1.campuscluster.illinois.edu 
prepend-path	 CPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/ipp/include:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl/include:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/pstl/include:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb/include:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb/include:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/daal/include 
setenv		 VT_LIB_DIR /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/intel64/lib 
setenv		 VT_ADD_LIBS -ldwarf -lelf -lvtunwind -lm -lpthread 
prepend-path	 LD_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/intel64/slib:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/intel64/lib:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/mic/lib:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/ipp/lib/intel64:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl/lib/intel64_lin:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb/lib/intel64/gcc4.4:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/iga/lib:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/libipt/intel64/lib:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/daal/lib/intel64_lin 
setenv		 TBBROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/tbb 
setenv		 VT_SLIB_DIR /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/itac/2018.1.017/intel64/slib 
setenv		 VTUNE_AMPLIFIER_2018_DIR /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/vtune_amplifier_2018.1.0.535340 
prepend-path	 INFOPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/documentation_2018/en/debugger/gdb-ia/info:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/documentation_2018/en/debugger/gdb-igfx/info/ 
setenv		 GDBSERVER_MIC /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/gdb/targets/intel64/x200/bin/gdbserver 
setenv		 MKLROOT /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl 
prepend-path	 PYTHONPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/advisor_2018.1.1.535164/pythonapi 
prepend-path	 NLSPATH /usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64/locale/%l_%t/%N:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl/lib/intel64_lin/locale/%l_%t/%N:/usr/local/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018/debugger_2018/gdb/intel64/share/locale/%l_%t/%N 
-------------------------------------------------------------------
```
```yaml
packages:
    all:
        compiler:
        - intel
        providers:
            blas:
            - intel-parallel-studio
            lapack:
            - intel-parallel-studio
            scalapack:
            - intel-parallel-studio
            mkl:
            - intel-parallel-studio
            mpi:
            - intel-parallel-studio
    intel-parallel-studio:
        modules:
            intel-parallel-studio@18.0.1: intel/18.0
        buildable: False
```
```console
$ spack install py-numpy
...
==> Installing py-numpy
==> Searching for binary cache of py-numpy
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for py-numpy found: installing from source
==> Error: InstallError: Cannot locate core MKL libraries:
	['libmkl_intel_lp64', 'libmkl_sequential', 'libmkl_core']

/home/adamjs5/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/intel.py:788, in blas_libs:
        785            shared=('+shared' in self.spec))
        786        debug_print(mkl_libs)
        787
  >>    788        if len(mkl_libs) < 3:
        789            raise_lib_error('Cannot locate core MKL libraries:', mkl_libnames)
        790
        791        # The Intel MKL link line advisor recommends these system libraries
```
@mgsternberg @davydden @glennpj @becker33 it looks like all of you have recently edited the `IntelPackage` base class. Let me know if there's any more output you would like to see.
